contents: Article 4 (Membership Deliberation Procedure, etc.) ① Sports organizations wishing to join as a member sports organization of the Sports Council must submit the following documents. However, for sports organizations for which there is no International Federation or Asian Federation, the documents in Item 13 are excluded. 1. Membership application form (Form No. 1 attached) 2. Organization introduction (history, item description, activity overview, organization, etc.) 3. List of executives (including individual inauguration acceptance letters and resumes) 4. Articles of incorporation and all regulations of the organization 5. Members Minutes of the general meeting of delegates that decided on membership 6. Game outline and game rules 7. Registration status of players, enthusiasts, and teams (including sports clubs) 8. Status of establishment of city/provincial sports organizations and affiliated federations 9. Establishment of city/county/district sports organizations Status 10. Performance of hosting competitions and club competitions 11. Previous year's business performance and business plan for the relevant year 12. Previous year's budget and settlement statement and budget for the relevant year 13. Related to the organization's membership in the International Federation of Sports (IF) and Asian Federation of Games (AF) Documents ② Organizations wishing to join as members must submit the documents corresponding to paragraph 1 by the end of December of each fiscal year, and the Sports Council must review them by March of the following year. However, in the case of dispatching and training national team athletes for the Olympic Games, Asian Games, etc., a separate deliberation period may be determined. ③ The membership and rating deliberation committee must comprehensively review and deliberate the membership requirements, review opinions of the Sports Council, etc., and the final decision on membership is made through a resolution of the board of directors in accordance with Article 9 of the Articles of Incorporation.
